meanings.definition: Spritelier (comparative form of spritely): more lively or energetic
meanings.sent1: The puppy was spritelier than the older dog, always bouncing around with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The children became spritelier as they played in the park, running and laughing joyfully.
meanings.sent3: The spritelier squirrel outwitted the slow turtle in the race, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her spritelier dance moves lit up the stage, captivating the audience with her energy.
meanings.sent5: The spritelier colors of the sunrise painted the sky in a vibrant display of nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: Spritelier (comparative form of spritely): having a cheerful and lively disposition
meanings.sent1: The spritelier child greeted everyone with a big smile and a warm hug.
meanings.sent2: She became even spritelier when her favorite song came on, dancing with pure joy.
meanings.sent3: The spritelier clown made everyone laugh with his silly antics and funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her spritelier personality shone through, making her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The spritelier flowers in the garden seemed to dance in the gentle breeze, spreading happiness all around.
